Constructor Detail

VoiceControl

public VoiceControl(android.content.Context mContext,
                    java.lang.String[] grammars,
                    java.lang.String[] wordlist)
Creates and initializes the VoiceControl object and its constituent elements. Parameters:

Parameters:
mContext - The Context of the application using VoiceControl.
grammars - An array of Strings that represents the file names of additional grammars to be added.
wordlist - An array of Strings that the SpeechRecognizer should find.

VoiceControl

public VoiceControl(android.content.Context mContext,
                    java.lang.String[] grammars)

VoiceControl

public VoiceControl(android.content.Context mContext)
Method Detail

destroy

public void destroy()
Destroys the SpeechRecognizer object to prevent leaking the service. This should be called whenever the app no longer needs the VoiceControl object, such as when the app is being closed rather than paused.

on

public final void on()
Enables the VoiceControl to output data.

off

public final void off()
Prevents the VoiceControl from outputting data.

onRecognition

protected abstract void onRecognition(java.lang.String result)
The callback to be overridden by implementing classes. Returns the String result of the most confident word the recognizer has to offer.

Parameters:
result - The String that was recognized.

setWordlist

public void setWordlist(java.lang.String[] wordlist)
Sets the wordlist of all VoiceControl objects because wordlists affect how the sensor distributes results.

Parameters:
wordlist - An array of Strings representing the words the Recognizer should exclusively receive.

addGrammar

public void addGrammar(byte[] data,
                       java.lang.String grammarName)
Adds a grammar to the current list of grammars in the form of a byte array. This array must contain the complete data of a compiled grammar file.

Parameters:
data - A byte array of the data that composes the compiled grammar file. This should be obtained from the app's Assets.
grammarName - The name by which this grammar will be identified in the recognition service. Two grammars cannot have the same name.

addGrammar

public void addGrammar(java.lang.String path,
                       java.lang.String grammarName)
Adds a grammar to the current list of grammars in the form of a String containing a path to a compile grammar file.

Parameters:
path - The path to the file containing the compiled grammar
grammarName - The name by which this grammar will be identified in the recognition service. Two grammars cannot have the same name.

addGrammar

public void addGrammar(int vuzConst)
Adds a grammar with a Constant from Constants.

Parameters:
vuzConst - An integer representing one of the standard Vuzix grammars. Possible values are: Constants.GRAMMAR_BASIC Constants.GRAMMAR_MEDIA Constants.GRAMMAR_CAMERA Constants.GRAMMAR_NAVIGATION Constants.GRAMMAR_WAREHOUSE Constants.GRAMMAR_MEDICAL

removeGrammar

public void removeGrammar(java.lang.String grammarName)
Removes a grammar from the list of currently recognized custom grammars.

Parameters:
grammarName - The name of the grammar to be removed. This must be the same as a name that was passed to the recognizer by calling addGrammar(). If no name is provided, the last grammar in the list will be removed.

removeGrammar

public void removeGrammar(int vuzConst)
Removes a grammar that was added with the VoiceControl.addGrammar(int) function.

Parameters:
vuzConst - An integer representing one of the standard Vuzix grammars. Possible values are: Constants.GRAMMAR_BASIC Constants.GRAMMAR_MEDIA Constants.GRAMMAR_CAMERA Constants.GRAMMAR_NAVIGATION Constants.GRAMMAR_WAREHOUSE Constants.GRAMMAR_MEDICAL
